content: I think about this all the time. Dating is weird. Like, things will be going well and then a guy comes over to my apartment and is like, wait, what? (It’s really spacious— I joke it’s because I’m compensating for all those years living in shoeboxes in Brooklyn) I keep hoping that by the time I find someone to be serious about, all this stuff will be fixed. Like, “Oh you make twice my salary, cool, let’s keep Netflix and chillin’”. In the meantime, my cat could not care less what I make as long as she gets fed.
